solution: The greatest integer less than $17.2$ is $17$, and the greatest integer less than $-17.2$ is $-18$, so our answer is $\boxed{-1}$.
chatgpt_solution: Since $17.2$ is between $17$ and $18$, $\lfloor 17.2 \rfloor = 17$. Since $-17.2$ is between $-18$ and $-17$, $\lfloor -17.2 \rfloor = -18$. Thus, $\lfloor 17.2 \rfloor + \lfloor -17.2 \rfloor = 17 + (-18) = \boxed{-1}$.
